titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the Commencement Orations Collection, 1833 - 1855

Wesleyan University
Middletown, CT, USA

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Commencement Orations Collection, 1833 - 1855
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult Special Collections & Archives staff.
did.abstract: The commencement orations given by 19th century Wesleyan students reflect their studies in classics and their interests in philosophy, literature, and politics.
The Commencement Orations Collection contains handwritten speeches written by graduating Wesleyan University students between the years of 1833 and 1855.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: Copyright for Official University records is held by Wesleyan University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Commencement Orations Collection, Collection #1000-131, Special Collections & Archives, Wesleyan University, Middletown, CT, USA.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by University Archives Staff, Valerie Gillispie, October 2006

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The commencement orations given by 19th century Wesleyan students reflect their studies in classics and their interests in philosophy, literature, and politics.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The Commencement Orations Collection contains handwritten speeches written by graduating Wesleyan University students between the years of 1833 and 1855.

arrangement.head: Collection Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged chronologically by year, and within each year by last name of student.

controlaccess.head: Online Catalog Headings
controlaccess.p: These and related materials may be found under the following headings in online catalogs.
